job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Multiple positions
Sunnyvale, CA or Austin, TX
SRE with/Without KAFKA
Job Description
- SRE Ops - Very good in Unix, Jenkins and Scripting - Groove / shell / python
- Should be proficient in creating Work Flows in Jenkins and Ansible playbacks
- Excellent Analytical, Troubleshooting and problem solving skills
- Very good in DevOps process and troubleshooting Issues
- Experience in Production Deployment and On-Call Support.
- Experience in solving problems and working with a team to resolve large scale production issues.
- Good to have knowledge in Ansible
